Name: FOMOD Plus - A Mod Installation Overhaul
Author: aglowinthefield
Description: A total rewrite and overhaul of the FOMOD experience. Show and install previous choices, filter your modlist by FOMOD-installed mods, scan to pre-populate FOMOD content detection, non-blocking, smart-resizing installer window, and more!

ReleaseNotes: First release on Plugin Finder~ See Nexus for changelog up until this point!
